definition: to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle

sentences.english: A three-dimensional model for studying the surface shape of the rolls textured by laser beam is set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一种研究激光刻花轧辊表面形貌的三维模型。

sentences.english: Trend of forged steel roll for rolling mills is forecast.
sentences.chinese: 还对锻钢轧辊的发展趋势做了预测。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a ginning and roll structure of plastic joint machine.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种塑料贴合机的轧花轧辊的结构。

sentences.english: According to simulant result, the optimal cooling model is provided.
sentences.chinese: 通过模拟计算的结果，给出了最佳的轧辊冷却模型。

sentences.english: A robust repetitive controller for roll eccentricity compensation of cold mill is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了用于冷轧机的轧辊偏心补偿的鲁棒重复控制器。

sentences.english: Avoid roll on roll contact by moving only one roll at a time.
sentences.chinese: 一次移动一支轧辊，防止辊身之间的接触，碰撞。

sentences.english: Effects of different tempering processes on surface microstructure of indefinite chill cast-iron roller were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了回火工艺对无限冷硬轧辊表层基体组织的影响。

sentences.english: The centrifugal compound casting process of needle-like bainite ductile iron roller was establish in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文制定了针状贝氏体球铁离心复合轧辊的生产工艺。

sentences.english: In addition, method for roll groove design of the mill is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了斜轧扩管机轧辊辊型设计方法。

sentences.english: Upper arm pivots have 4-step cam adjustment for easy roll center changes.
sentences.chinese: 上臂支点有4步凸轮调整容易轧辊中心的变化。

sentences.english: There are two boys playing marbles, while a boy nearby rolls a hoop.
sentences.chinese: 有两个男孩玩弹珠，而一名男童附近的轧辊一夏。

sentences.english: We learn from the world roll machine industry's successful experience.
sentences.chinese: 我们吸取世界轧辊成型机行业的成功经验。

sentences.english: This paper mainly describes the manufacturing technology for forged semi-steel hot mill rolls.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要阐述锻造半钢热轧辊的制造工艺技术。

sentences.english: Low roll surface roughness will decrease the total campaign being rolled.
sentences.chinese: 轧辊表面粗糙度过低，将会减少轧辊上机的压研量。

sentences.english: Low roll surface roughness will decrease the total campaign being rolled.
sentences.chinese: 轧辊表面粗糙度过低，将会减少轧辊上机的压研量。

sentences.english: Crossing between rolls or roll and strip is one of the major reasons to emerge axial force.
sentences.chinese: 轧辊间的空间交叉是产生轧辊轴向力的主要原因。

definition: to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
